default.value: Current status: Vault service routed via Traefik but no secrets integration. Need to implement full Vault integration for CI/CD secrets management, certificate storage, and dynamic credentials. Traefik already has route configured for vault.cloudya.net pointing to localhost:8200.

traefik-analysis.value: GitHub Actions workflow found at .github/workflows/deploy.yml. Uses secrets: TRAEFIK_DEPLOY_KEY, SERVER_IP, ACME_EMAIL. Deploys via SSH to remote server with Nomad orchestration. No Docker containers or local builds. Direct deployment pattern with verification steps.

Vault NOT installed locally (binary not found). Vault references in config files point to localhost:8200 service. Expected to run on remote deployment server. Configuration includes routing through Traefik at vault.cloudya.net. No local Vault secrets integration found.

CRITICAL ISSUES: 1) No test automation in CI/CD 2) No security scanning 3) Hardcoded credentials in middleware config 4) No secret rotation 5) Missing backup/recovery procedures 6) No performance monitoring 7) Limited error handling 8) No artifact management 9) SSH-based deployment lacks proper validation 10) Missing branch protection rules
